DIRTYCODE_API int32_t NetGameDistServAddClient ( NetGameDistServT *  pDistServ,
int32_t  iClient,
NetGameLinkRefT *  pLinkRef,
const char *  pClientName 
)

Add a client to the client list.

Parameters
*pDistServ- module state
iClient- index of slot to add client to
*pLinkRef- link ref to create dist with
*pClientName- name of client
Returns
int32_t - negative=error, else success
Version
02/05/2007 (jbrookes)

References NetGameDistServClientT::bDisconnected, NetGameDistServClientT::bInitialized, NetGameDistServT::ClientList, NetGameDistServClientListT::Clients, DirtyMemGroupEnter(), DirtyMemGroupLeave(), ds_strnzcpy(), GMDIST_DEFAULT_BUFFERSIZE_IN, GMDIST_DEFAULT_BUFFERSIZE_OUT, NetGameDistServT::iMemGroup, NetGameDistServClientListT::iNumClients, NetGameDistServT::iVerbosity, NetGameDistCreate(), NetGameDistSetProc(), NetGameDistSetServer(), NetGameLinkRecv(), NetGameLinkSend(), NetGameLinkStatus(), NetPrintf, NetPrintfVerbose, NetGameDistServClientT::pGameDist, NetGameDistServT::pMemGroupUserData, NetGameDistServClientT::strName, and TRUE.

DIRTYCODE_API int32_t NetGameDistServControl ( NetGameDistServT *  pDistServ,
int32_t  iControl,
int32_t  iValue,
int32_t  iValue2,
void *  pValue 
)

Control behavior of module.

Parameters
*pDistServ- pointer to module state
iControl- status selector
iValue- control value
iValue2- control value
*pValue- control value
Note
iControl can be one of the following:
        'mpty' - set the number(iValue) of empty frames needed to pause traffic 
        'crcc' - set the CRC challenge send rate in number of frames (0 to disable)
        'crcr' - set the CRC max response times in number of frames (0 makes it infinite)
Version
03/17/2009 (jrainy)

References NetPrintf, NetGameDistServT::uCRCRate, NetGameDistServT::uCRCRemainingFrames, NetGameDistServT::uCRCResponseLimit, and NetGameDistServT::uSendThreshold.

Starts the game, enabling controller passing.

Parameters

Version
03/05/2007 (jbrookes)

References NetGameDistServT::bGameStarted, NetPrintf, NetTick(), TRUE, NetGameDistServT::uCRCRate, NetGameDistServT::uCRCRemainingFrames, NetGameDistServT::uCRCResponseCountdown, and NetGameDistServT::uLastFlowUpdateTime.

DIRTYCODE_API int32_t NetGameDistServStatus ( NetGameDistServT *  pDistServ,
int32_t  iSelect,
void *  pBuf,
int32_t  iBufSize 
)

Get status information.

Parameters
*pDistServ- pointer to module state
iSelect- status selector
*pBuf- [out] storage for selector-specific output
iBufSize- size of output buffer
Returns
int32_t - selector specific
Note
iSelect can be one of the following:
        'ninp' - whether we are currently in the mode where no inputs are sent due to
                    stall in input arrival
        'ftim' - flow time. Time (ms) since the last flow control packet was received.
Version
24/09/2012 (jrainy) first version

References NetGameDistServT::bGameStarted, NetGameDistServT::bNoInputMode, NetTick(), NetTickDiff, and NetGameDistServT::uLastFlowUpdateTime.
